room_title: Escape room "Avengers VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: I did the Avengers experience and it was so great. I loved it

room_title: Escape room "Avengers VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: The Avengers virtual experience was above amazing. You use all your senses. Sight, smell, touch, and so on. My son said it was the best virtual experience he’s ever done. We’d do it again for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Avengers VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: We went while it was Avengers themed. This was my first time and it was insane amazing. The total immersion, the sound design, the smells that match the images, the whole experience was like something from the future. Extremely well done story and game play, i would do this again in a heart beat.
